name: math
description: This library provides basic mathematical functions. It provides all its functions and constants inside the table math.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to be rounded up.

static_functions.description: Return the integer no greater than the given value (even for negatives)
static_functions.name: ceil

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Angle in radians

static_functions.description: Return the tangent value for a given value in radians.
static_functions.name: tan

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: Numbers to get the smallest from.

static_functions.description: Return the minimum value from a variable length list of arguments
static_functions.name: min

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base value.

parameters.name: modulator
parameters.description: The modulator.

static_functions.description: Returns the remainder of the division of base by modulator that rounds the quotient towards zero
static_functions.name: fmod

parameters.name: exponent
parameters.description: The exponent for the function.

static_functions.description: Returns e (the base of natural logarithms) raised to the power exponent
static_functions.name: exp

parameters.name: m
parameters.description:
If m is the only parameter: upper limit.

If n is also provided: lower limit.

If provided, this must be an integer.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description:
Upper limit.

If provided, this must be an integer.

static_functions.description: Generates pseudo-random numbers uniformly distributed
static_functions.name: random

parameters.name: degrees
parameters.description: The angle measured in degrees.

static_functions.description: Convert from degrees to radians
static_functions.name: rad

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Angle in radians

static_functions.description: Return the sine value for a given value in radians.
static_functions.name: sin

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Angle in radians

static_functions.description: Return the cosine value for a given value in radians.
static_functions.name: cos

parameters.name: normal
parameters.description: Sine value in the range of -1 to 1.

static_functions.description: Return the inverse sine in radians of the given value.
static_functions.name: asin

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: The new seed

static_functions.description: Sets a seed for the pseudo-random generator: Equal seeds produce equal sequences of numbers
static_functions.name: randomseed

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to be rounded down.

static_functions.description: Return the integer no less than the given value (even for negatives)
static_functions.name: floor

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: Numbers to get the largest from

static_functions.description: Return the maximum value from a variable length list of arguments
static_functions.name: max

parameters.name: normal
parameters.description: Tangent value.

static_functions.description: Return the inverse tangent in radians. We can do this by supplying y/x ourselves or we can pass y and x to math.atan to do this for us
static_functions.name: atan

parameters.name: cos
parameters.description: Cosine value in range of -1 to 1.

static_functions.description: Return the inverse cosine in radians of the given value.
static_functions.name: acos

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The number to get the absolute value of.

static_functions.description: Return the absolute, or non-negative value, of a given value
static_functions.name: abs

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The value to get the base from exponent from.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The logarithmic base.

static_functions.description: Returns the inverse of this. math.exp(1) returns e
static_functions.name: log

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base value.

static_functions.description: Return the integral and fractional parts of the given number
static_functions.name: modf

parameters.name: radians
parameters.description: Value to be converted to degrees.

static_functions.description: Convert from radians to degrees
static_functions.name: deg

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to get the square root of.

static_functions.description: Return the square root of a given number. Only non-negative arguments are allowed
static_functions.name: sqrt
